scripts.prebundle: mkdir -p app && cp package*.json app && ln -sf $(pwd)/src app && ln -sf $(pwd)/node-v20.10.0-linux-x64 app && npm install --omit=dev --prefix ./app ./
scripts.deploy: export $(cat .env | grep "^[^#;]" | xargs) && TF_VAR_heroku_api_key=$HEROKU_API_KEY TF_VAR_slack_app_token=$SLACK_APP_TOKEN TF_VAR_slack_bot_token=$SLACK_BOT_TOKEN tofu -chdir=infra apply -auto-approve
scripts.production: npm run bundle && npm run deploy

scriptsComments.postinstall: Downloads the Node runtime to include when bundling
scriptsComments.start: Runs the app on the current machine
scriptsComments.bundle: Creates an archive of the app to upload
scriptsComments.deploy: Pushes any changes to production with environment variables
scriptsComments.lint: Ensures formatting rules and style guidelines are followed
